alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 1:28PM PST until January 11 at 9:30AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central California, including the following county, Mono. * WHEN...Until 800 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry creeks. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 125 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen in the past few hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... US-6 between Bishop and the NV stateline, Chalfant Valley, and US-395 south of Crowley Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
